post:
Hi everyone, We are excited to let you know, we have opened another location within Equinix HK2! To celebrate the launch of the HK location we’ve prepared a promotional offer. Please use the HKGLAUNCH promotional code at the checkout for 30% off recurring price on ANY of our virtual servers in Hong Kong, valid until 30th Sep 2021.

Offer

S2N-1C1G

  • CPU: 1 vCore
  • RAM: 1GB DDR4 ECC
  • Disk: 16GB RAID1 NVMe SSD
  • Data Transfer: 1TB
  • Uplink: 2x40Gbps capped at 10Gbps

Price: $7 / mo $10 / mo
Use Coupon: HKGLAUNCH
Order

Higher plans can be found on our website.

Datacenter & Network Information:

Datacenter: Equinix HK2
Transit: CDN77 (NTT, PCCW, Telia, Cogent, TATA, Vodafone), Cogent
Peering: Equinix Hong Kong, BBIX Hong Kong, HKIX and PNI w/ Google

NETWORK PERFORMANCE TO MAINLAND CHINA IS NOT OPTIMAL, PLEASE CONSIDER THIS BEFORE PLACING ORDER

Test IP: 45.11.104.130 / 2407:b9c0:f001:130:5054:ff:fed0:8dd
Traceroute: MTR | Ping.Sx

Basic L4 DDoS Protection is provided by default at no cost.
